channel.title: Cargo on Wesley Hales
channel.description: Recent content in Cargo on Wesley Hales

item.title: Running Seam 2.0 on Tomcat(EJB3) using Maven and Cargo
item.description: In this article I review a simple Seam 2.0.0.CR2 app that deploys to Tomcat 6.0.13 with JBoss Embedded Beta2. It's great to see Seam move to Maven because tracking and installing all those dependencies in a local repository was a pain in the ass! This project is moving fast, and if you wanted to keep up with the latest version, it was a lot of work. So now that my life is easier, I thought I would make the Seam+EJB+Tomcat user's life a little easier also.
